title: Dan Marino’s Nutrisystem Diet, December Jobs Report, VC Trends for 2018
itunes:title: Dan Marino’s Nutrisystem Diet, December Jobs Report, VC Trends for 2018
description:
Dawn Zier, CEO at Nutrisystem, and Hall of Fame Quarterback Dan Marino, discuss weight loss and staying fit. Chris Lu, Former Deputy Secretary of Labor, breaks down the December U.S. non-farm payroll numbers. Ajay Agarwal, Partner at Bain Capital Ventures, says the physical world is going digital. We Drive to the Close with Chris Zaccarelli, CIO at Independent Advisor Alliance. Mark Gurman, Bloomberg Technology Reporter, talks about the first augmented reality glasses with Amazon’s Alexa voice assistant being shown next week at CES in Las Vegas. And Carol and Pimm Fox hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” on Wall Street while Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.”  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dawn Zier, CEO at Nutrisystem, and Hall of Fame Quarterback Dan Marino, discuss weight loss and staying fit. itunes:author: Bloomberg
